segments.text: Is there anything I can help you with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , thank you . I am really far behind on this project . Could you help me with the extra typing or xeroxing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . That would be very helpful . Can you start with those pages over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much ! How long have you been working here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been working here for 5 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we have some special projects coming up . Would you be interested in working on any of those ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I would love to work on a special project !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well then , I'll keep you in the loop . Thank you for your help today .
segments.speaker: S2
